startParam.name: Landslide Detection Model Sliding Window Prediction
startParam.description: Perform sliding window prediction using a trained model

param.name: input_dir
param.info: Root directory containing multiple landslide area subdirectories, with the same structure as training data

param.name: output_dir
param.info: Root directory for saving prediction results, subdirectories will be created by area

param.name: model_def_path
param.info: Python file containing the model class definition

param.name: model_class_name
param.info: Name of the model class for dynamic loading

param.name: window_size
param.info: Height and width of the sliding window (in pixels), should be consistent with the cropping size during training

param.name: stride_x
param.info: Movement step of the sliding window in the horizontal direction (in pixels)

param.name: stride_y
param.info: Movement step of the sliding window in the vertical direction (in pixels)

param.name: pred_threshold
param.info: Threshold for converting probability to binary prediction (0-1)

param.name: device
param.info: Computing device to use, 'cuda' for GPU, 'cpu' for CPU

param.name: batch_size
param.info: Batch size for prediction, adjust according to memory

param.name: exclude_features
param.info: List of feature types that do not need to be used

param.name: target_sentinel_bands
param.info: Names of Sentinel-2 bands to be retained

param.name: use_multi_gpu
param.info: Whether to enable multi-GPU parallel computing, effective when device is cuda and multiple GPUs are available
